item.title: Confessions of a Progress Bar Addict: The Ecstasy of Waiting
item.description:
Hi, my name is Dillon Baird, and I’m a progress bar-aholic.

There, I said it. It feels good to get that off my chest. It’s a problem, I know. But like any true addiction, I can’t help myself. Those little bars, those tiny digital beacons of hope, they’re my kryptonite.
